Package com.visionspace.taskmanager

Class TaskManagerFactory

java.lang.Object
com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerFactory
public class TaskManagerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Entry point class for instantiating task managers.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static TaskManagerFactory INST
    Singleton instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TaskManager createDistributedTaskManager​(int numWorkerThreads)
    Creates a distributed task manager TaskManager, i.e., one where tasks are persisted in external storage and that allows for task manager restarts.
    TaskManager createLocalTaskManager​(int numWorkerThreads)
    Creates a TaskManager where submitted tasks run on the local JVM and where task state is not persisted across task manager executions.

  • Field Details

    • INST

      public static TaskManagerFactory INST
      Singleton instance.

  • Method Details

    • createLocalTaskManager

      public TaskManager createLocalTaskManager​(int numWorkerThreads)
      Creates a TaskManager where submitted tasks run on the local JVM and where task state is not persisted across task manager executions.
      Parameters:
      numWorkerThreads - The maximum number of concurrent tasks.
      Returns:
      The local task manager.

    • createDistributedTaskManager

      public TaskManager createDistributedTaskManager​(int numWorkerThreads)
      Creates a distributed task manager TaskManager, i.e., one where tasks are persisted in external storage and that allows for task manager restarts. Tasks submitted on this task manager may end up being executed in a separate JVM, allowing for scalability (launch capacity may be increased by increasing the number of task manager nodes) and fault tolerance (tasks are guaranteed to be executed as long as there is one launcher node running).
      Parameters:
      numWorkerThreads - The maximum number of concurrent tasks.
      Returns:
      The distributed task manager.
